name: OdessaRecord
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill is the voice-activated module for The Odessa Record, a small community newspaper that serves Odessa, Wash., Lincoln County and the surrounding area. It will provide news headlines from the area as they are posted each day or week. To access the service from your Alexa device, you'll need to enable the Odessa Record skill in your Alexa app. Once enabled, it will be added to your flash briefing. You can access it by saying, "Alexa, what's my flash briefing?" or "Alexa, what's in the news?"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
